price: Na alipanda kiburi yeye na majeshi yake katika nchi bila ya haki, na wakadhania kuwa hawatarudishwa kwetu.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: Firauni na majeshi yake wakaendelea wakifanya kiburi katika nchi ya Misri kwa upotovu. Na wakadhani kuwa kabisa hawato fufuliwa Akhera kwa ajili ya hisabu na malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunūduhu fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waẓannū annahum ilaynā lā yur'jaʿūna
